name: Slave Balls Brainwashing
mes:
It was done; your experiments were a success. You have created a new type of Pokeball to make a special monster. A slave monster. When you throw it, it captures both a Pokemon and its trainer in a flash of purple light. Then within the ball, they are fused into a new creature that only obeys you and only lives for you. 

Your first test was a success, you fused your fellow researcher with her Rotom, and she now helps you pick new targets and records their information like a pokedex... a "slave dex," if you will.  With her at your side, it was time to collect more Slave monsters. As they say, "Gotta Catch Them All."

name: Slave Balls Brainwashing
mes:
"Yes, Master," your assistant coos as she stands beside you, the remnants of her former self completely masked by the devotion her transformed self now holds. Her appearance mirrors that of her old self but twisted with tinges of provocative delight, wearing attire that reveals more than it conceals, her skin glowing with an otherworldly aura of erotic display.

She sways her hips seductively, adjusting the clingy fabric barely covering her breasts before stepping forward. "Shall we target our next subject?" she asks, eagerness dripping from each word.

The streets outside the laboratory are bustling with activity, oblivious to the fate of those captured with your cunning invention. Unbeknownst to them, they are all potential subjects for your growing army of Slave Monsters.

"Look over there," your assistant whispers as she points towards a nearby crowd. A young trainer, no more than 18 years old, stands close to her Pikachu. Her long brunette hair flows down her back in waves, reaching her curvaceous hips. The top barely containing her modest chest while she hops on her heeled feet enthusedly speaking to friends.

Her name tag reads "Isabella," and she seems entirely preoccupied with her conversations. Her Pikachu appears vigilant beside her, yellow cheeks sparking occasionally as it surveys its surroundings.

"It would be so easy," your assistant murmurs close to your ear, breath warm against your neck. "To take her and turn such enthusiasm into pure devotion for only you."
